description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(235).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,92,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[235], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(15 + 46 x + 15 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 92 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 02 2013 *)LinearRecurrence[{0, 92, 0, -1}, {15, 46, 1395, 4231}, 20] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Nov 02 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
